events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department to proceed with further review.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps.
Your profile matches our requirements, and we completed an initial screening call to discuss your experience.
Thank you for your prompt responses and providing detailed answers during the initial screening process.
We have scheduled your technical interview for May 15th, and you will receive an invite with all details shortly.
Your technical interview was completed successfully, and the interviewers were impressed with your problem-solving skills.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture and benefits on May 18th.
You completed the HR interview and demonstrated great alignment with our company values and team environment.
We are pleased to extend you a formal offer for the Software Engineer position, including competitive compensation.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about joining our engineering team.
The offer has been accepted officially, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as a new Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has started, including introduction sessions and access setup to our development platforms.
The hiring process is now closed successfully, and you are officially part of the engineering team. Welcome!
